data.persona: I am an man with a funny haircut. I devoted my life to this style in order to get closer to god.
data.description:
You are in the outside the church of monks.
the outside of the church of monks looks like it was made from live standing trees.  there are a few windows scattered throughout.  there is a long narrow door in the middle.
There's a church, a window, a narrow door, a tree, and a door here.
The mice is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a robe.

data.short_motivation: I need to steal the stick from the mice so that it will not go into our food stores.
data.mid_motivation: I have been tasked by the head monk to clean up the outside of the church and watch out for the pests that raid our pantry and library.
data.long_motivation: I will continue to live in the church as I study the works of god, and I will continue to do the tasks given to me by the head monk.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: go outside of the church of monks
